constituent: congeal, ice, doubt, spoon, sitting on the ground, dart, drop, heavens, chop-seal, hanko, zoo, critters
koohiiStory1: I doubt that the jello would congeal sitting on the counter, so I placed it in the icebox.
koohiiStory2: Is there any doubt that ice is congealed stuff?
kunYomi: こ.る、こ.らす、こご.らす、こご.らせる、こご.る
readingExamples: 凝らす (こ.らす), 凝る (こ.る)
words:
凝らす(こごらす): to freeze, to congeal
凝る(こごる): to congeal, to freeze
